name: Google Calendar / Highlight Calendar (Orange)
description: Can you find your schedule items on your calendar only by color? This style makes specific calendar underlined and changes shape to be recognized them very easily. Select color "Mango" for your favorite calendar and try it. for new look: - underline & solid corner for orange colored items for old look: Orange colored schedules are changed their shapes for each view: - "Day"/"Week"/"7Days" view : Rounded rectangle. - "Month" view : Underline for time specified schedule, Rounded rectangle for full-day schedule, - "Agenda" view : Underline for time specified schedule. # Only orange colored calendar is supported now. üç∫ To support us, you can buy us a beer!
additional_info:
2018-03-31 make color selector for mango rectangle
2018-03-25 support day, week, 4-days rectangle
2018-03-24 added totally re-written styles for new looking calendar after 2017-2018
2016-09-15 added url rule
2013-02-28 supplemented the one rule we missed... (no more?)
2013-02-27 supplemented rules for some variations of orange not highlighted...
2012-12-17 fixed margin color mixed when events overlapped.
2012-12-17 support future events of "Week" view.
2012-11-12 fix not highlighted day!(a color added)
2012-09-24 support Day, Week, 7 Days and Agenda.
2012-09-19 the 1st release.
